functions.name: split_date_column
functions.description: Split a given date column in a pandas dataframe into day, month and year columns

inputs.name: date_column
inputs.description: The name of the date column to split

inputs.name: day_column
inputs.description: The name of the day column to create

inputs.name: month_column
inputs.description: The name of the month column to create

inputs.name: year_column
inputs.description: The name of the year column to create

outputs.name: df
outputs.description: The dataframe with the new columns
